cta_intents.explore_options: Helps patients browse available clinical pathways without committing to treatment.
cta_intents.check_suitability: Guides patients to confirm whether a treatment fits their clinical situation.
cta_intents.understand_process: Explains stages, timelines, and what to expect before deciding.
cta_intents.compare_alternatives: Supports side-by-side understanding of related treatments or approaches.
cta_intents.related_treatment: Links to adjacent treatments that may solve the same problem or follow on.
cta_intents.maintenance_and_aftercare: Encourages planning for follow-up care, hygiene, or protective measures.
cta_intents.book_consultation: Invites a clinical consultation or assessment when appropriate.
cta_intents.ask_a_question: Provides a route to seek clarification without booking.
